column4: HElp!  I just installed a cupple beryl packeges then after i installed them all the settings i put into beryl where erased!  pluss, now i cant download anything anymore.  I cant even open the Add/Remove thing
Somebody help pleazzzz
Will somebody help me?
beryl support is in #ubuntu-effects, thanks.
just take a partitioner, and remove your windows partition
whats a partitioner?
u there?
system > administration > gnome partition editor
http://ubuntu-tutorials.com/2007/07/02/swapboost-v01alpha-early-testers-wanted/
tar.gz is just a compression/etc type, there are a number of different ways to install one, based on whats inside of it.  This is a probable method htoug
wait, i have to install somthing first?
what?
i have to install somthing to make swapboost work?
That page gives step by step instructions
I dont get how to do it, can you tell me pleas?
Theres steps on that page.  First put your USB in, then run `./swapboost.sh -n` and that's it.
ok, how do i run somthing>  I forgot
open a terminal to the directory the script is in, chmod a+x swapboost.sh then ./swapboost.sh -n
that page has a good rundown, if you're looking to re-learn
when I run swapboost command, do i run it in the terminal or what?
are you sure i dont have to download somthing?  All i do is run ./swapboost.sh -n?   In the terminal or how do i run it?
